org.shared.net.handler

Interface SynchronousHandler.Resolver

  • Enclosing class:
    SynchronousHandler<C extends Connection>

    protected static interface SynchronousHandler.Resolver
    Defines a gadget that supports SynchronousHandler.ManagedInputStream and SynchronousHandler.ManagedOutputStream.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int resolve(int size)
      Resolves a read/write.

    • Method Detail

      • resolve

        int resolve(int size)
            throws IOException
        Resolves a read/write.
        Parameters:
        size - the number of bytes read or remaining to be written.
        Returns:
        the return code.
        Throws:
        IOException - when something goes awry.
